Control Name: 5.3.4 Security updates to VMs are applied in a timely manner, and strong passwords exist on those VMs for any local administrative accounts that may be in use.
Control Statement: Attackers constantly scan public cloud IP ranges for open management ports and attempt "easy" attacks like common passwords and unpatched vulnerabilities.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.3 What practices and tools have you implemented as part of the development cycle?
control_attributes.Control: 5.3.4 Security updates to VMs are applied in a timely manner, and strong passwords exist on those VMs for any local administrative accounts that may be in use.
control_attributes.Description: Attackers constantly scan public cloud IP ranges for open management ports and attempt "easy" attacks like common passwords and unpatched vulnerabilities.
